greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for Sum_{m>=0} 1/(2^2^m - 1).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=suminf(m=0, 1/(2^2^m - 1)); x=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 20000, write("b048650.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 07 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: Deleted old PARI program. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 20 2009
